title: sans display face for Northpine
content:
Hi

Does any body know this font? I think it might be bespoke. Worth a try though.

[http://www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105649/http:/www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine6.jpg "http://www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine6.jpg")

[http://www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine8.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105649/http:/www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine8.jpg "http://www.scenario.co.nz/images/selected-work/northpine8.jpg")

Thanks

Jono
author: mrjono

comments.content:
looks like collegiate black, free at:  
 [http://www.fontspace.com/casady-and-greene/collegiateblackflf](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105649/http:/www.fontspace.com/casady-and-greene/collegiateblackflf "http://www.fontspace.com/casady-and-greene/collegiateblackflf")

Not quite - Jono’s sample doesn’t have serifs.

- Lex

Could it be [Vafle Tape](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/suitcase/vafle_tape/&sample_text=STRONG%20STUFF) with a stroke to make it bolder/rounder? That would account for the counter of the ’A’ being filled in.

- Lex
